properties.name: x
properties.description: The left edge in pixels, default 0

properties.name: y
properties.description: The top edge in pixels, default 0

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width in pixels, default window.screen.width

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height in pixels, default window.screen.height

properties.name: camera
properties.description: Choose the camera to use 'front' or 'rear', default 'front'

properties.name: tapPhoto
properties.description: Tap to take a photo, default true (picture quality by default : 85)

properties.name: previewDrag
properties.description: Preview box drag across the screen, default 'false'

properties.name: toBack
properties.description: Preview box to the back of the webview (true => back, false => front) , default false

properties.name: alpha
properties.description: Alpha channel of the preview box, float, [0,1], default 1
